name: 黃乾怡
objective: This course provides a fundamental understanding of statistical quality control concept. Subjects for quality implementation will include: Dimensions of quality, 7 tools for quality improvement, quality function deployment (QFD), failure mode and effect analysis (FMEA), Taguchi experimental deign, Kano model of quality, TRIZ, etc, etc.
schedule:
1　　Dimensions of quality,
3-4　　7 tools for quality improvement, 
5　　quality function deployment (QFD), 
6　　failure mode and effect analysis (FMEA), 
8-9　　Taguchi experimental deign, 
10　　Kano model of quality, 
11　　Process capability
12-13　　Control chart
14-16　　Systematic innovation (TRIZ)
18　　Final exam
scorePolicy:
1.　　Group report: 40 %
2.　　Attendance 30%
3.　　(Final exam 30%)
4.　　extra score for participation
materials:
Handout

Quality Control; D. Besterfield; Pearson Education; 2009
